title: Healthy tomato pasta sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '5 to 6 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '1/2 yellow pepper, chopped', '1 stick celery, chopped', '6 mushrooms, chopped', '1 (400g) tin plum tomatoes', '1 (500g) carton passata', '1 apple, peeled, cored and chopped', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
